casebody.data:
No. 11-5102. Eric A. Klein, Petitioner v. Talkin, Muccigrosso and Roberts, L.L.P. 565 U.S. 1077, 132 S. Ct. 836,

181 L. Ed. 2d 524,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8669. December 5, 2011.

Motion of petitioner for reconsideration of order denying leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
